lines.text: [Sariss was about to kill the incapacitated Kyle Katarn. Yun however quickly put his lightsaber in the way of the blow, resulting in Sariss slashing through his body. Yun drops on his knees]

[suprised and almost regretful]
... Why?

[breathing heavily]
He is a Jedi. He deserves a battle.
[falls over dead]
Such a bad fall, but you'll be glad to know, I found your lightsaber. Want it? Ahh, very distinctive...
[he drops it on the ground, then picks up a rock and throws it down onto it, smashing it. He laughs maniacally]
Not so distinctive now is it?
Enough of this!
[Boc shuts up immediately]
Tell Jerec that this Jedi will soon join the dead.
[a hologram of Morgan Katarn has just presented his son Kyle with Qu Rahn's lightsaber]
Use it well. Use it for good.
When someone desires information, they come to me.

Your path is at the moment of change. Jerec, the man who murdered your father, is a great evil. He searches for the location of a sacred place, the Valley of the Jedi. The Force of thousands of Jedi is trapped here. If Jerec captures this power, he will be a creature such as the universe has never seen. A supernova of stars in a fleeting thought. The eradication of life from a star system in a whisper will be within his power. Your father gave his life to protect this power and now it is a place your destiny must take you. The disk you have in your possession will lead you to the ways of the Jedi. Remember, it will be your path... to the ways of the Force.

[suprising 8t88 from behind]
I should have aimed your head when I had the chance.
A lost opportunity.
In all my years, I have only known Dark Jedi, never one from the light side.
[smirks]
Somehow, I expected more.

[voiceover]
I can't abide this creature named Boc. He is one of the few that actually uses two lightsabers in battle. He is a crude individual that lacks both tact, and teeth. Only a Dark Jedi can he be.

[voiceover]
Out of all the Dark Jedi I have met, Sariss is the one I can say, I fear. Powerful, strong in both the physical and mental arenas of the Force, she is a master, a perfectionist, quiet and reserved. This makes her a very dangerous foe.
Whenever I need to find you, you're always in some kind of trouble.
Jan! What a pleasant surprise.

[smiling]
What would you do without me, Kyle?
I'd be a content old man.

[laughs]
Somehow I don't see a content or an old man.
I am here for my well deserved payment.
Finally I get to wipe your putrid taste from the force.

[Jan is captured by the Dark Jedi]
Looks likeI can't bail you out of trouble this time.

[to Kyle]
Strike her down. And realize your true power as a Dark Jedi, your true power!

[voiceover]
His heavy brow overshadows the empty recesses that normally embrace human eyes. Jerec has the uncanny power to absorb and overshadow one's connection to the Force... like a dark cloud. A deep, empowering grasp of your will is what you need.
Our spies bring word of a small rebel uprising on Danuta.
I have no time for petty uprisings. Extinguish them painfully.

[smiling softly with her nice looking face]
Yes, Emperor.
Well, your blessed ship is going to be in the repair bay for the next few days.
How's it look?
Nothing that a crate full of money which you don't have wouldn't solve.
Like always, I owe you. Can you take care of her for me?
You're not going after Jerec, are you?
No. I'm going back to my father's home on Sulon. Can you meet me there when you're finished with the Crow?
Of course. Is everything all right?
I don't know. I'll find out when I get there.
Don't waste my time 88, tell me who killed my father.
Patience. He is a Dark Jedi.
Jedi?
DARK Jedi. He's known as Jerec and he has great plans for the rebirth of the Empire.
I'm not interested in petty political struggles.
Well you should be. Without going into too much detail, Jerec has been quite generous in his offerings. Unfortunatly you don't factor into them.
[a bunch of thugs point blasters at Kyle]
But I am not without a heart.
[Shows Kyle an antique data disk]

Familiar, yes? I found it in your death father's home. I can decypher any language or code known but this one eludes me. It must be important. Tell me what it is and won't have to induldge in their darker side.

[smiles defyingly]
The dark side? I've been there. Do your worst.

[getting up]
Well, I suppose that concludes our business.
You're weak like your father! Jerec, he gave him a sweet slow death, a death worthy of a coward! I had the honor of taking his head and thrusting it on a spike for all to see!
Is this a drill or something?
I have no idea. Somebody told you that?
No, it's just that we haven't had any drills in a while...

[saving Jan]
This is gonna cost YOU a crate full of money YOU don't have.
As long as I'm around to pay you, I don't care.
My thoughts exactly.

[appearing out of nowhere]
Mine too!
[laughs maniacally]
[if Kyle goes to the Dark Side of the Force]

[voiceover]
For you the choice is the Dark Side. Forever will it dominate your destiny.
[repeated line]
Set blasters on full!
